mapper.insert: INSERT INTO C_ATTEND (A_DATE, U_ID, G_NO, A_FLAG) VALUES(SYSDATE, #{u_id}, #{g_no}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT A.A_FLAG, A.A_DATE, A.U_ID, A.G_NO FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A_DATE, G_NO, U_ID, A_FLAG FROM C_ATTEND WHERE U_ID = #{u_id} AND G_NO = #{g_no} ORDER BY A_DATE DESC) A WHERE RNUM = 1
